content: if you have any questions please message me on instagram @eniki studio i am more active there if you do not have instagram alenadelena@gmail com this includes a *tall version* and a *short version* the tall version means the side that wraps around will be shorter than the hanging edge the short version will make the tied corners longer but the stockinette appearance appears horizontal when worn a simple stockinette triangle kerchief for chilly spring days when it s too warm for a whole scarf but too cold to keep your neck exposed needles us 3 or 3 25mm yarn road to china light - beryl 1 skein or 150 yards fibre 65% baby alpaca 15% silk 10% camel 10% cashmere hours roughly 10 hours some notes to help you with the short version - at the longest side the sample is in total 32 inches long - from base to tip it is 10 inches - i made sure to block the kerchief to achieve the size and shape i desired - i started decreasing at around row 114 when i achieved 16 inches of length just note only with this yarn and my gauge will it be 32 inches long if i knit a total of 228 row the length from base to tip will be vastly different with a different yarn weight you should take into account your own yarn and gauge consider knitting a gauge square first to learn how many row you need to reach the kerchief length you desire with the yarn you d like to use here are a few of many tutorials https //www gathered how/knitting-and-crochet/knitting/knitting-gauge-squares https //theknittersyarn com/blogs/news/how-to-knit-a-gauge-square-stocking-stitch https //youtu be/7grcszledkq si=hmsuvpodoyqeaxvd i reserve no rights to this pattern anyone can take this for themselves and share it with anyone for free without attribution you are also welcome to use any of my cuddle kerchief images and this pattern for promotions and events
